name: Sklearn Random Forest Classifier
description: Random Forest Classifier, fits a number of decision tree classifiers on various sub-samples of the dataset and uses averaging to improve the predictive accuracy and control over-fitting. The sub-sample size is controlled with the max_samples parameter if bootstrap=True (default), otherwise the whole dataset is used to build each tree.

fields.name: targetCol
fields.title: Target Column
fields.description: The label column for model fitting

fields.name: featureCols
fields.title: Feature Columns
fields.description: Feature columns of type - all numeric, boolean and vector

fields.name: n_estimators
fields.title: NEstimators
fields.description: Specifies the number of trees in the forest.

fields.name: criterion
fields.title: Criterion
fields.description: The function to measure the quality of a split. 'gini' for the Gini impurity and 'entropy' for the information gain.

fields.name: max_depth
fields.title: MaxDepth
fields.description: The maximum depth of the tree. If not set, nodes are expanded until all leaves are pure or until all leaves contain less than min_samples_split samples.

fields.name: min_samples_split
fields.title: MinSamplesSplit
fields.description: The minimum number of samples required to split an internal node. Higher values prevent creating nodes with few samples, which can be sensitive to noise.

fields.name: min_samples_leaf
fields.title: MinSamplesLeaf
fields.description: The minimum number of samples required to be at a leaf node. A split point is only considered if it leaves at least this many training samples in each of the left and right branches.

fields.name: min_weight_fraction_leaf
fields.title: MinWeightFractionLeaf
fields.description: The minimum weighted fraction of the sum total of weights required to be at a leaf node. Weights are assigned to individual samples in the construction of the tree.

fields.name: max_leaf_nodes
fields.title: MaxLeafNodes
fields.description: Grow a tree with `max_leaf_nodes` in best-first fashion. If not set, then unlimited number of leaf nodes is used.

fields.name: min_impurity_decrease
fields.title: MinImpurityDecrease
fields.description: Generally used to control over-fitting. The higher the value, the more conservative the algorithm will be.

fields.name: bootstrap
fields.title: Bootstrap
fields.description: Whether bootstrap samples are used when building trees. If False, the whole dataset is used to build each tree.

fields.name: oob_score
fields.title: OobScore
fields.description: Whether to use out-of-bag samples to estimate the generalization accuracy.

fields.name: random_state
fields.title: RandomState
fields.description: Default value is None

fields.name: warm_start
fields.title: WarmStart
fields.description: When set to True, the existing trained trees in the model are reused and additional trees are added to the ensemble. This can save time when incrementally increasing the number of trees in the model.
